thread.title: Austria horror: Truck driver denies knowledge of grisly cargo
thread.title_full: Austria horror: Truck driver denies knowledge of grisly cargo | News24

author: news24.com
title: Austria horror: Truck driver denies knowledge of grisly cargo
text:
Montana - One of the suspected drivers of the truck found abandoned in Austria with the decomposing bodies of 71 migrants inside denied on Thursday knowing there was anyone on board, as a Bulgarian court remanded him in custody.
Tsvetan Tsvetanov, 32, was brought to the hearing in handcuffs - both on his hands and feet - and under heavy police escort.
He was arrested in his home in a Roma neighbourhood of Lom in northwest Bulgaria on Monday on an European arrest warrant issued by Austrian prosecutors.
Appearing in court in the Bulgarian town of Montana, he kept silent when asked by journalists if he was the driver of the truck, but answered "No" when asked if he knew that he was carrying people inside.
